title: Putin and nationalization of energy industry

content.question: Which of the following best describes a popular energy policy undertaken by the Russian government?

choices.label: The government renationalized the oil industry to bring it under government control.
The government collaborated with multinational corporations to produce oil.
The government privatized the gas industry to make it more efficient.
The government created special energy economic zones in St. Petersburg.

content.answer: The government renationalized the oil industry to bring it under government control.
